public.about.meta-description: Learn more about Parallel's mission and our story
public.about.mission: Our mission is to free the time and minds of professionals
public.about.story-1: When we were in our previous jobs, we realized that in almost all the topics we were carrying, it was usual to ask for information, it being usual for customers to take a long time to send the information we needed to work.
public.about.story-2: That information we requested was essential to start working.
public.about.story-3: When asking other professionals, many agreed that this same situation often happened to them. It did not matter if at the time of requesting the information we left it beautiful and easily understood, customers rarely responded to the email with all the information.
public.about.story-4: It was common for customers to send the information with an eyedropper or forget to send certain documents. This forced us to constantly chase customers so that we could have all the information.
public.about.story-5: We began to investigate what tools in the market could solve that situation and not seeing any tool that solved it well and in a simple way we decided to solve it ourselves.
public.about.story-6: At that time Parallel was born.
public.about.tech-company: Parallel is a technology company that builds the next generation tools for professionals daily tasks.
public.about.title: About

public.case.laura.client-anywhere: The convenience for her clients, who now can upload their files at any time and from any device.
public.case.laura.increased-billing: In just one month, Laura has managed to increase her billable hours and an additional net income of â‚¬ 1,500 per month.
public.case.laura.non-billable: All these tasks add up to more than 20 hours a month that Laura cannot bill to her clients.
public.case.laura.recently-discovered: Laura has recently discovered Parallel and is regaining almost an hour a day.
public.case.laura.register: If you want to start using Parallel for free, register here.
public.case.laura.reminders: The peace of mind about not having to chase clients, because Parallel does it for her.
public.case.laura.time-spent: Laura spends more than an hour everyday requesting information and reviewing emails to make sure she has all the documents she needs to start her work.

public.security.data-at-rest: Your data at rest is encrypted using the 256-bit AES-256 (Advanced Encryption Standard).

public.security.pass-storage: We will never store your passwords as you type them, you can only reset them by means that allow us to verify your credentials.
public.security.pillar: At Parallel we maintain security as one of our fundamental pillars. We know that trust is the foundation of any relationship. For this reason, we protect you and the people with whom you interact.
public.security.protect-your-customer: How do we protect your clients' information?
public.security.secure-access: You can safely access your files from any computer, and all communications and requests for information will be kept safe from third parties.
public.security.ssl-connection: We use SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) to protect data in transit between the Parallel application in your browser and our servers.
public.security.system-security-layers: To achieve this, our system has multiple layers of protection and is secure by design.
public.security.title: Security
public.security.trust-our-security: Trust Parallel to keep all your information safe and confidential.
public.security.verify-identity: In addition, no one will be able to access upload pages to download or view information without first identifying themselves.
public.security.your-connection: How do we protect your connection?
public.services.automate: Automate the collection of information checklists
public.services.automation.activity: Control deadlines and keep an audit log.
public.services.automation.reminders: Set up reminders or send them manually with one click.
public.services.automation.templates: Use templates to work fast and comfortably.
public.services.checklists-collaboration: Manage documents and information checklists efficiently and improve collaboration with your clients and between your colleagues.
public.services.collaboration.anywhere: Work from a computer or a mobile device.
public.services.collaboration.avoid-repe: Avoid requesting the same information more than once.
public.services.collaboration.centralize: Centralize conversations in a single place.
public.services.collaboration.no-install: Always accessible, no downloads or installs needed.
public.services.collaboration.see-review: Track what documents have already been reviewed.
public.services.hero-title: Increase the efficiency of your firm with Parallel
public.services.knowledge.scale: Standarize projects to scale the business.
public.services.knowledge.share: Share and distribute templates with specific people, teams, or the entire organization.
public.services.knowledge.templates: Transform your document and information checklists into reusable templates.
public.services.meta-description: Increase your firm efficiency. Manage documents and information checklists efficiently and improve collaboration with your clients and colleagues.
public.services.title: Professional Services
public.showcase-hero-alt: A screenshot of the app showcasing the information received using Parallel
public.team-collaboration.cta-title: Do you want to see how it works? Try it now!
public.terms.title: Terms & Conditions
public.who-trust-us.feedback: and this is what they say...
public.who-trust-us.feedback-1: Parallel has been very agile in the execution of our requirements and templates are flexible. Happy with the experience.
public.who-trust-us.feedback-2a: It's a very useful, easy-to-use and intuitive platform, for both Cuatrecasas and for our clients.
public.who-trust-us.feedback-2b: When we use Parallel for KYC we save a lot of time in both external and internal communications, and all doubts and comments from our clients are in the same place, so that we can forget about searching things in old email conversations.
public.who-trust-us.feedback-3: Reviewing documents from our clients is twice as fast than it was. It is mainly due to the ease of access to the documents and the information provided in the forms.
public.who-trust-us.title: Already trust us
recipient-view.complete-signer-info-dial: An eSignature is required to complete this petition. Who has to sign the document?
recipient-view.completed-petition.toast-: {name} will be notified for its revision.
recipient-view.delegate-access-dialog.su: Please fill out the contact details of the person you want to delegate your access.
We will send them an email with instructions on how to proceed.
recipient-view.delegate-access.help: Use this option to request someone else to complete the information for you.
recipient-view.expired-code-description: The code has expired. Please try again.
recipient-view.field-comments.placeholde: Ask here your questions and doubts
recipient-view.first-time.claim-1: The information will be saved automatically as you add it.
recipient-view.first-time.claim-2: You can come back as many times as you'd like using the link you received in your email.
recipient-view.first-time.claim-3: You can add any comments and questions you'd like. Submit them at once whenever you decide.
recipient-view.first-time.intro: Is this the first time you use Parallel?
recipient-view.petition-closed-alert: This petition has been closed. If you need to make any changes, please reach out to {name}.
recipient-view.petition-completed-alert-: This petition has been completed and {name} has been notified for its revision and validation.
If you want to make any changes don't forget to hit the Finalize button again.
recipient-view.petition-delegated.toast-: We have sent an email to {email} with instructions to access this petition.
recipient-view.petition-requires-signatu: This petition requires an eSignature to be completed.
We will send the document to sign once the replies have been reviewed and validated.
recipient-view.remaining-attempts: You have {attempts, plural, =1{one more attempt} other{# more attempts}}
recipient-view.review-before-sign.body-1: This petition requires an eSignature in order to be completed.
recipient-view.review-before-sign.body-2: We have notified {name} to proceed with the review of the replies and once validated we will send an email with the document to sign by the appropriate people.
recipient-view.submit-unpublished-commen: You have some pending comments. Submit them at once to notify {sender} in a single email.
recipient-view.verify-1: It looks like you are trying to access this page from a new device.
recipient-view.verify-2: To ensure the privacy of your data, we need to verify your identity with a code you will receive on your email {email}.
settings.api-tokens.confirm-delete-token: Any applications or scripts using this {count, plural, =1 {token} other {tokens}} will no longer be able to access the Parallel API. This action cannot be undone.
settings.api-tokens.explainer: Personal Access Tokens can be used to access the Parallel API.
settings.security.password-change-toast-: Your password has been successfully changed.
settings.title: Settings
template.description-edit.placeholder: Write a short description of this template.
template.message-settings.header: Email to send with the template
timeline.access-activated-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} gave access to {contact} {timeAgo}
timeline.access-deactivated-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} removed access to {contact} {timeAgo}
timeline.add-user-permission-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} shared this petition with {other} as {permissionType} {timeAgo}
timeline.comment-deleted: {same, select, true {You} other {{someone}}} deleted a comment on field {field} {timeAgo}
timeline.comment-published-deleted: Someone wrote a (now deleted) comment on field {field} {timeAgo}
timeline.comment-published-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{author}}} commented on field {field} {timeAgo}
timeline.edit-user-permission-descriptio: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} updated {other}'s permission to {permissionType} {timeAgo}
timeline.message-cancelled-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} cancelled a scheduled a message {subject, select, null {without subject} other {with subject {subject}}} to {contact} {timeAgo}
timeline.message-scheduled-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} scheduled a message for {scheduledAt} {subject, select, null {without subject} other {with subject {subject}}} to {contact} {timeAgo}
timeline.message-sent-description-manual: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} sent a message {subject, select, null {without subject} other {with subject {subject}}} to {contact} {timeAgo}
timeline.message-sent-description-schedu: A message scheduled by {same, select, true {you} other {{user}}} {subject, select, null {without subject} other {with subject {subject}}} was sent to {contact} {timeAgo}
timeline.ownership-transferred-descripti: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} transferred the ownership of this petition {previousOwner, select, null {} other {from {previousOwner} }}to {owner} {timeAgo}
timeline.petition-closed-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} closed the petition {timeAgo}
timeline.petition-correct-notified-descr: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} notified {contact} that the petition is correct {timeAgo}
timeline.petition-created-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} created this petition {timeAgo}
timeline.petition-reopened-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} reopened the petition {timeAgo}
timeline.reminder-sent-description-autom: An automatic reminder was sent to {contact} {timeAgo}
timeline.reminder-sent-description-manua: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} sent a manual reminder to {contact} {timeAgo}
timeline.remove-user-permission-descript: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} stopped sharing this petition with {other} {timeAgo}
timeline.reply-created-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{createdBy}}} replied to the field {field} {timeAgo}
timeline.reply-deleted-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{deletedBy}}} deleted a reply to the field {field} {timeAgo}
timeline.reply-updated-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{updatedBy}}} updated a reply to the field {field} {timeAgo}
timeline.signature-cancelled-description: {same, select, true {You} other {{user}}} cancelled the eSignature process {timeAgo}
timeline.signature-completed-description: The eSignature process on the petition has been completed {timeAgo}
timeline.signature-started-description: We started an eSignature process on the petition {timeAgo}
tour.contact-details.personal-informatio: All the essential information of your contact will be displayed here: email, first name, and last name.
Parallel will use the first name shown here for any messages you send to your contact. Make sure it is correct.
tour.contact-details.petitions-content: Here is a list of all the petitions you sent to your contact to help you find them faster.
tour.contacts-details.page-content: You can find all the information regarding a contact stored in Parallel on this page.
tour.contacts.add-contact-content: Here you can create a contact before sending any petition to them.
tour.contacts.page-content: Here you can find a list with every contact that you have sent a petition to or that you have created from this page.
tour.petition-activity.access-and-remind: In this section, you will be able to:
Send an automatic or custom reminder message to your recipients.
tour.petition-activity.events-content-1: Are you wondering if your recipients read the emails or opened the recipient replies page?
tour.petition-activity.events-content-2: Have a better overview of what is happening around your petition with the activity timeline.
tour.petition-activity.page-content: Here you can view and manage your petitions' access, messages, follow-ups, and event history.
tour.petition-compose.fields-content: Here you can add what you need from your recipients and choose the type of information it is (files or written replies).
tour.petition-compose.initial-content-1: On this page, you can set up the information that you need from your recipients.
tour.petition-compose.initial-content-2: Let us show you step by step!
tour.petition-compose.initial-title: Let's fill out your first petition
tour.petition-compose.next-content: Once you have added all the fields that you need, click {next} to customize the email message.
tour.petition-compose.petition-settings-: Here you will be able to change settings like:
The language of the recipient view and the message we will send to them.
The deadline that you want to inform the recipients.
tour.petition-replies.conversations-cont: Is there anything not clear? Is the submitted document incorrect?
Avoid back and forth emails, and keep track of the conversations around documents or information here.
Take your time to include your comments and send them when they are ready.
tour.petition-replies.download-content-1: Save time downloading and renaming all the files from here.
tour.petition-replies.download-content-2: Try using variables to set how you want your filenames to appear.
tour.petition-replies.page-content: On this page, you can see all the items that you requested to the recipients.
tour.petition-replies.page-title: Here you have your information on the requests
tour.petition-replies.review-items-conte: Here you can control and verify the information that your recipients have submitted.
Keep track of the documents and replies you review by using the approve and reject buttons.
If the information is correct and you need them, you can download the files, or copy the text responses.
tour.petitions-list.create-petition-cont: We want you to focus on what matters, so let us collect the information for you.
We will let you know when the recipients complete everything.
tour.petitions-list.create-petition-titl: Let's start by creating a petition!
tour.petitions-list.welcome-content-1: We are here to help you collect and organize the documents and information you need, keeping everything under control.
tour.petitions-list.welcome-content-2: If this is your first time here, let us show you around!
